data.title: Malabar Fabrics
data.meta_description: A simple, playful yet sophisticated stripe that will elevate your home. It is suitable for domestic upholstery & drapery needs.
data.text:
Description

Kalka is a sophisticated stripe design with a raised, satin weave structure. It coordinates with a wider stripe; Avala. Both designs are beautiful upholstery fabrics and are suitable for drapery, throw pillows, blinds & more.

Both Avala, and Kalka, are inspired by the joy and uplifting feeling of our wildest adventures.

Hand dyed in small batches by master colorists. Woven by hand on a traditional floor loom by master weavers.
